column4: Trying to watch videos on Firefox on Kubuntu, some play, many do not. The videos that don't play on Firefox do play on Chrome. Can someone please tell me how to get all youtube videos to play on Firefox?
It's probably videos which use H.264 (a proprietary video codec) rather than Theora or VP8 (both open and unencumbered).
Is there a wy to tell?
And is there a way to get H.264 to work?
